programme.title: Urusei Yatsura: Only You
programme.desc: Everyone in town gets an invitation to Ataru's wedding, and Lum is not listed as the bride.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Movie
programme.desc: Young Yugi (Dan Green) must use his game skills to defeat his bitter rival (Eric Stuart) and an Egyptian mummy.

programme.title: A Wind Named Amnesia
programme.desc: A mysterious wind blows away all of humanity's memories and reduces people to a more primitive state. Through certain circumstances, Wataru relearns how to speak and think.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: The Picture That Swallows People - Da Vinci
programme.desc: A ghostly painter with the ability to trap souls within his work has reawakened, and not even the other ghosts of the old schoolhouse want anything to do with him; Satsuki and the gang travel back in time in order to put the artist back to sleep.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Railroad Crossing of Evil: The Ghost Photograph That Takes Lives
programme.desc: Convinced that a ghost is haunting a train crossing, Leo takes the gang out to try and catch the spirit in a photo; when one of those photos shows a strange hand on Momoko's shoulder, things start getting bad, and a tale of revenge unfolds.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Ritual of Darkness: The Devil's Spell
programme.desc: Satsuki falls in with a coven; several girls at school conspire to cast spells together, and she reluctantly joins; but when one of them goes missing, and no one seems to remember the girl's very existence, Satsuki knows this isn't any ordinary fad.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: Nest of Evil Spirits: The Public Housing Block That Consumes People!!
programme.desc: Following an accident on the job, Satsuki's father is injured, but Leo thinks ghosts are behind it; when the gang investigates the building Satsuki's father worked at, they find that the building itself is alive and eager to have guests stay.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.sub-title: He Snow Specter: The Horror of Bloodstained Lake!!
programme.desc: The gang takes a trip to the mountains to stay at a resort run by Satsuki's cousin Miyuki; upon arrival, a young girl tells them that Miyuki is dead; it seems that her ghost still haunts the frozen lake, turning it blood red.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: When Metabee's medal goes missing, the gang suspects that Team France has stolen it.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: Samantha unravels as she prepares for a ballet recital while training for her next match.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: Ikki falls under the spell of a championship girls' team from Sweden.

programme.title: Medabots
programme.desc: The adventures of Ikki and his Medabot Metabee and their hopes to become champions of the Robattle competitions.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: An intergalactic bounty-hunter comes to Mobius and attempt to catch Sonic.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic, Wes Weasley and Sergeant Doberman attempt to breach the defences of Robotnik's new fortress, and none of them can stand the sight of each other.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik decides to cripple Mobius' three major transit systems, Rail, Air, and Sea, to fully gain control of the planet; Sonic has to circumnavigate the planet to save the day.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik constructs a coach robot in an attempt to increase Scratch, Grounder and Coconuts' fitness; Sonic tries to use Robotnik's equipment against the Robots.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic comes to the rescue of a town that is being held ransom by a crime syndicate.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Coconuts inadvertently creates a super-power formula when his janitor bucket spills in the lab; Robotnik falls into it and becomes Super Robotnik, then challenges Sonic to a fight.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: An asteroid is heading for Turtle Town; Robotnik offers to save it only if Sonic agrees to play in the Robolympics against Robotnik, Scratch and Grounder.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After defeating Six-Gun Pete, Sonic becomes the Sheriff of Tranquil Gulch and has to defend it from Dr. Robotnik.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik waits for Professor Caninestein to make his time machine so he can go back in time and steal four chaos emeralds and gain the powers of invisibility, invincibility, immortality and life.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik heads for the time of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table; He meets Merlence, who hands him the Emerald of Invincibility; Robotnik takes over the throne and makes Merlence change Sonic's boots to stone.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik and his followers head for ancient Mobegypt, where they can find the Emerald of Immortality.

programme.title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The Badniks go back to the Mesozoic Era and steal the Emerald of Life, but not before Robotnik kills his Dumbniks. Sonic is too late to stop him.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Jimsy, and Lana reunite with Dyce on the Barracuda, meanwhile Dr. Lao must return to Industria to help save its residents.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan, Jimsy, and Lana explore High Harbor and meet the villagers but Jimsy can't help but get into mischief.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Jimsy must catch a wild pig in order to redeem themselves with Orlo, the leader of a local gang.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Lana has a nightmarish vision that Dr. Lao's flying machine is engulfed in flames and fears an attack; Conan does his best to try and ease her worries.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: When Industria soldiers reach High Harbor, the villagers must band together to defend their home.

programme.title: Future Boy Conan
programme.desc: Conan and Lana try to evade Industria's soldiers but Lana is captured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part One
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures takes place; Lupin targets the auction and discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who is supposed to have died saving his life.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd Part 2
programme.sub-title: The Lupin I Loved, Part Two
programme.desc: Lupin reunites with Cornelia; Cornelia is caught between the lies her father tells her and her memories of love for Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand; Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them as well.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd Part 2
programme.desc: Phantoma Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Phantoma, is plotting to take over the world.

programme.title: Aim for the Ace!
programme.sub-title: A love letter flutters onto the court
programme.desc: Hiromi wins the practice match for the secondary member selection; but Munakata tells her that a match won without so much as an ace is no win at all and orders her to do even more training.

programme.title: Aim for the Ace!
programme.sub-title: Do Not Lose to the Men's Tennis!

programme.title: Aim for the Ace!
programme.sub-title: Hiromi versus the Butterfly! The Final Showdown
programme.desc: The meeting about secondary members has begun; but Hiromi's name isn't there; then, she's given a single chance, she has to win a match against Madam Butterfly.

programme.title: Aim for the Ace
programme.desc: Hiromi Oka, a first-year student at West High School, joins the tennis club admiring Reika Ryuzaki, aka Mrs. Butterfly, and senior Todo; she is a complete beginner, but as soon as she joins the club, the devilish coach, Munekata, sees her talent.

programme.title: Aim for the Ace!
programme.desc: Hiromi Oka's been chosen to play on the top class Nishi High tennis team; the older girls glare coldly, even the kind and beautiful Madam Butterfly won't talk to her; Hiromi wants to quit the team, but Coach Munakata won't let her.

programme.title: Hajime No Ippo: The Fighting!
programme.desc: Ippo practices shadow boxing.
